title: Evaluation of Immediate Next Step for Antimatter Containment Optimization
description: Prioritize HTS coil development for antimatter containment and warp field generation, as plasma-based antiproton production faces significant energy barriers. HTS coils are critical for stable magnetic fields and can advance independently while alternative production methods are explored.
thresholds_breakthroughs: Achieve simulated HTS coil fields of 5-10 T with ripple <1%
Validate thermal margins for space-relevant conditions

papers.math: delta B / B = sum_(n=1)^(oo) a_n cos(n theta)

notes: Thresholds met via REBCO coil optimization preprint: simulated 7.07 T fields with 0.16% ripple (<1%), validated 74.5 K thermal margins for space conditions (T_env=4 K). Preprint available at Zenodo DOI:10.5281/zenodo.17047492, supporting antimatter containment with precision fields and scalable design.

title: Experimental Validation of Lentz Hyperfast Solitons in Lab-Scale Plasma Environments
description: Replicate soliton formation using positive energy sources, extending 2021-2025 models including Applied Physics' 2025 warp drive proposals to micro-scale experiments.
thresholds_breakthroughs: Validate thermal margins for space-relevant conditions
notes: HTS coil development from previous milestone provides foundation for magnetic confinement in soliton experiments. Begin with literature review and preliminary plasma simulations to bridge to experimental validation.

title: Scaling Antimatter Production Yields Using Laser-Plasma Interactions
description: Double production efficiency beyond 2024-2025 CERN AD/ELENA upgrades, targeting micrograms annually with laser enhancements. Prioritize hybrid accelerator-laser approaches to address energy gaps in antiproton production, as current laser-plasma methods fall short of required thresholds.
thresholds_breakthroughs: Increase pair production by 2x via high-intensity lasers
Demonstrate GeV-scale proton acceleration in laser-plasma for feasibility

papers.technical_objective: Laser intensity optimization for Breit-Wheeler process
papers.math: N_pairs = alpha^2 (E / m_e c^2)^2 exp(-8/3 chi)

papers.technical_objective: Plasma density control for yield scaling
papers.math: omega_e = sqrt(4 pi e^2 n_e / m_e)

title: Portable Antimatter Trap Design for Space-Relevant Conditions
description: Advance CERN's 2024 BASE portable antimatter tech for vacuum/microgravity testing, incorporating 2025 antihydrogen beam production.
thresholds_breakthroughs: Store >10^10 antiprotons for >1 hour without annihilation

title: Metamaterial Analogues for Simulating Warp Bubble Dynamics
description: Use 2024-2025 metamaterial models, including hexagonal structural warp metamaterials, to emulate spacetime curvature, addressing infeasibility critiques.
thresholds_breakthroughs: Negative refractive index > -1 at GHz frequencies

title: Cryogenic Systems Optimization for Antimatter Storage in Microgravity
description: Build on NASA's 2024 CFM portfolio and Purdue's zero-gravity research for boiloff reduction in space cryogenics.
thresholds_breakthroughs: Maintain <4K temperatures for >1 year in orbit

title: Nanotechnology-Enhanced Catalysts for Antimatter Generation Efficiency
description: Apply 2024-2025 nanotech in energy nanomaterials to create nanoscale traps boosting yield, per top nanotechnology trends.
